p: Estimates of R 0 , κ L, ρ L , κ I and ρ I were combined to simulate and characterize the course of LPAI outbreaks in turkey flocks. Simulations were carried out in R statistical software [21]. Simulations started with one index case infected at time = 0 and 9,999 susceptible birds. The end of the latent and infectious periods of the index case were sampled and stored. At each time step of 0.02 days, the number of infected birds I was calculated; then the number of new infections C was sampled from a binomial distribution ( n = number of susceptible birds; p = 0.02 β I/10,000; β = transmission rate = R 0 λ I ); finally, the latent and infectious periods of the new cases were sampled and stored.
